steps.step: step into a neutral bow as you perform a vertical outward and a straight punch to the ribs.
pivot into a forward bow and execute a reverse punch, also to the ribs.
pivot back into a neutral bow as you perform a inward horizontal palm heel to the back of the head. Continue the motion of your left arm and check your opponent's right arm into their body.
pivot back into a forward bow as you strike your opponent's face with a inward circular palm heel claw.
Continue the motion of your right hand circularly as you drop into a close kneel. Strike the top of your opponent's calf with a downward hand sword.
Keeping your body low, perform a step-through knife-edge side to the back of your opponent's left leg.
